thread.section_title: Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely and comfortable suits. Uniqe service.
thread.title_full: Lovely and comfortable suits. Uniqe service. - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: yushka
title: Lovely and comfortable suits. Uniqe service.
text:
Beautiful hotels in good location are not rare.
But a hotel where the staff remembers guest's names are.
Apart from a welcoming feeling, I felt more secure. One does not see crowds going in and out. They know who is a guest and who is not.
They were also very helpful.
I have forgotten a couple of things in the room. By the time I reached home I already had an e-mail saying what I have forgotten and that the hotel will mail it to me.
Quilon restaurant which is a part of the hotel is great.
